official_title: A resolution concerning the dual banking system.

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives: (1) supports the authority of States to determine and to regulate the activities of State-chartered banks consistent with the Federal and State interest in the safety and soundness of the banking system; and (2) pledges to preserve and strengthen the dual banking system.

titles.title: A resolution concerning the dual banking system.
